definition: A synthetic material commonly employed in the creation of various objects, characterized by its malleability and ability to be molded into different shapes. It is frequently utilized in the production of everyday items, such as containers, packaging, and household goods.

examples.german: Die Verwendung von Plastik hat in den letzten Jahrzehnten zugenommen.
examples.english: The use of plastic has increased in the last few decades.
Plastic bottles are a major source of pollution.

examples.german: Die Plastikindustrie ist ein wichtiger Wirtschaftszweig.
examples.english: The plastic industry is an important sector of the economy.

examples.german: Plastik kann recycelt werden, um die Umweltbelastung zu reduzieren.
examples.english: Plastic can be recycled to reduce environmental impact.
